data.name: Yi and the Thousand Moons OST
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack to Yi and the Thousand Moons, featuring seven original songs and six preludes composed by David Su.

Track Listing:
1. Prelude #1 {1:03}
2. Moondrops (feat. Dominique Star, Wesley Kwok, Fishdoll & Gabriel Zucker) {3:24}
3. Prelude #2 {1:08}
4. Orange Grey Skies (feat. Dominique Star, Morningsiders & Laila) {2:48}
5. Prelude #3 {1:05}
6. Poster Child (feat. Dominique Star, Wesley Kwok, Fishdoll & Gabriel Zucker) {2:08}
7. Prelude #4 {0:59}
8. Interlude (feat. Dominique Star) {0:43}
9. Prelude #5 {1:02}
10. Chant of the Craftspeople (feat. Dominique Star, Morningsiders, Laila, Wesley Kwok, Fishdoll & Gabriel Zucker) {2:23}
11. Prelude #6 {1:03}
12. A New Home (feat. Morningsiders & Laila) {1:08}
13. Orange Grey Skies (Reprise) [feat. Dominique Star] {1:14}
14. End Credits {0:37}

Starring:
Dominique Star as Yi
Laila Smith as Villager Qing
Magnus Ferguson as Villager Wen
Reid Jenkins as Villager Zhi
Wesley Kwok as God Shui
Yuyu Feng as God Mu
Gabriel Zucker as God Huo

Additional Musicians:
Siddhu Anandalingam (saxophones)
Reid Jenkins (violin)
Gabriel Zucker (guitar)

All tracks are in 320kbps MP3 format, and will be downloaded into a "soundtrack" directory within the "Yi and the Thousand Moons" directory.

data.short_description: The original soundtrack to Yi and the Thousand Moons, featuring seven original songs and six preludes composed by David Su. Starring a full cast and live band.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
